page.title: 11Games Children Play
page.content: Small children use their{imagination in the games they play. The boys pretend they are heroes from television programmes like the "Dukes of Hazzard" or the "A_Team". In summer, girls play handstand game called "Ready, Steady, Handstand". Here they land in different positions on their tummies; one is called "squashed tomato" and another, with their legs wide apart, is called "banana splits". They also play singing games with actions. One is :"My mummy is a baker, yummy,yummy" (then you rub your tummy). Another is: "My Daddy is dentist, agh, agh, agh" (then you show your teeth). Some of these rhymes have lots of verses and end up with the girls{lifting up their skirts! }
